text: Yeh zameen mein aur zyada istakbaar (guroor) karne lagay aur buri buri chaalein chalne lagey, halanke buri chaalein chalne walon hi ko lay baithti hai. Ab kya yeh log iska intezar kar rahey hain ke pichli qaumon ke saath Allah ka jo tareeqa raha hai wahi inke saath bhi barta jaaye? Yahi baat hai to tum Allah ke tareeqe mein hargiz koi tabdili na paogey aur tum kabhi na dekhoge ke Allah ki sunnat ko uske muqarrar raaste se koi taaqat pher sakti hai
